sub_title: Certified teaching and training of the German and English language at all levels to all ages / Passionate & professional linguistic services | Translation between German, English and Dutch texts
summary: Passionate about languages, education and creating a personal, practical and enjoyable learning environment. Increase student participation and motivation in learning German or English through engaging lessons and activities. Experienced in translating texts between the German, English and Dutch languages. Strong ability to establish and maintain effective relationships. Lived for many years in UK, Netherlands and Germany, fluent in German, English and Dutch.
